page.title: 05HOME LIFE IN THE EIGHTIES
page.content: MY NAME IS LISA McCARTHY AND I AM 11 YEARS OLD. THERE ARE 6 PEOPLE IN MY FAMILY, MUM, DAD, TWO SISTERS, A BROTHER AND MYSELF. MY DAD IS A CARPENTER WHO WORKS FOR HIMSELF AND EMPLOYS OTHER MEN. MY MUM WORKS IN THE FIELDS AT VARIOUS TIMES OF THE YEAR HARVESTING THE CROPS SUCH AS ONIONS, CABBAGE OR LETTUCE. IN THE SUMMER WE ALL GO DOWN TO THE BEACH NEARBY. WE ALL GET ON WELL TOGETHER BUT LIKE MOST FAMILIES WE DO HAVE ARGEMENTS. WE ALL HAVE DAILY CHORES TO DO. MINE ARE TO KEEP MY ROOM TIDY, TO WALK THE DOG AND TO WASH AND WIPE THE DISHES. MY ELDEST SISTER IS THIRTEEN AND SHE DOES A PAPER DELIVERY ROUND TO EARN HER POCKET MONEY. SHE ALSO BABY SITS FOR OUR NEIGHBOUR. WE DO LOTS OF THINGS TOGETHER SUCH AS WALKING, SHOPPING, DAY TRIPS OUT AND DIFFERENT SPORTS.
